REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2068 reute d f BC-LIPOSOME-<LIPO.O>-FOR 06-19 0090

TEXT.TITLE: LIPOSOME <LIPO.O> FORMS CANADIAN SUBSIDIARY
TEXT.BODY: Liposome Co Inc at its annual meeting announced the formation of a Canadian subsidiary, Canadian Liposome Co Ltd. It said the company cements a relationship with University of British Columbia researcher Pieter Cullis and his scientific group who are developing anti-cancer products for Liposome. The company also said lead bankers completed Liposome's stock offering of one mln shares on June 11 at 6.875 dlrs a share. Liposome said it netted 7,388,750 dlrs. Reuter
